description: Is an instance of a class prop type

cdm.description: Invoked once, only on the client (not on the server), immediately after the initial rendering occurs.

cdup.description: Invoked immediately after the component's updates are flushed to the DOM.

cgd.description: Invoked after a component is instantiated as well as when it receives new props. It should return an object to update state, or null to indicate that the new props do not require any state updates.

con.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props as arguments

conc.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props and context as arguments

cwm.description: Invoked once, both on the client and server, immediately before the initial rendering occurs

cwr.description: Invoked when a component is receiving new props. This method is not called for the initial render.

cwun.description: Invoked immediately before a component is unmounted from the DOM.

cwup.description: Invoked immediately before rendering when new props or state are being received.

ptao.description: An array of a certain type

ptaor.description: An array of a certain type required

pte.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum

pter.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum required

ptet.description: An object that could be one of many types

ptetr.description: An object that could be one of many types required

ptir.description: Is an instance of a class prop type required

ptnd.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array

ptndr.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array required

ptoo.description: An object with property values of a certain type

ptoor.description: An object with property values of a certain type required

ptsh.description: An object taking on a particular shape

ptshr.description: An object taking on a particular shape required

rccp.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes

rcfc.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes and all lifecycle methods

ren.description: When called, it should examine this.props and this.state and return a single child element.

rfc.description: Creates a React functional component without PropTypes

rfce.description: Creates a React functional component with emotion import

scu.description: Invoked before rendering when new props or state are being received.

ssf.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

sst.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

uec.description: React useEffect() hook with a cleanup function
